body:
Helloo ^-^

My schedule has gotten extremely busy lately due to extracurricular activities and school has been stressful for me. So, unfortunately after a long period of contemplation (not a lot actually, since I don't have time for that apparently due to school), I have decided to step down from my moderator position... (Not referee however, so you'll still be seeing me around from time to time). 

Thank you everyone on the staff team for helping me develop into a more confident, smarter (debatable, I know), and happier person. You guys are doing a great job and please continue to work your hardest.

Stay positive everyone c;

title: My Retirement...

Thanks for sticking around Frosty! 
Although I haven't been the most active recently, I'm positive your experience benefitted the staff team tremendously :)

Good luck with school!

Noooo Jess! :'(

Good luck with school. <3

replies.body:
Awe dang Jess, hope you come back at some point when you find more spare time in your life. Good choice that you put real life tasks first for a while. But trust me though, you won't be able to stay away permanently. I tried leaving a few times and you see how well that worked lol. 

Hope you stay on skype! Really fun to talk to you.
